Constructor Detail

EmbreoLocalTree

public EmbreoLocalTree(EmbreoParams mysettings,
                       EmbreoLocalRoots froots)
Create a JTree representing the files and directories on the local computer, that supports drag and drop. A double click displays the file in a new window, or retrieves a directory listing to add to the tree.

Parameters:
mysetting - List of parameters
froots - A list of filesystem roots

EmbreoLocalTree

public EmbreoLocalTree(EmbreoParams mysettings,
                       EmbreoLocalRoots froots,
                       javax.swing.JPanel viewPanel)
Create a JTree representing the files and directories on the local computer, that supports drag and drop. A double click displays the file in a new window, or retrieves a directory listing to add to the tree.

Parameters:
mysetting - List of parameters
froots - A list of filesystem roots

addObject

public javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode addObject(java.lang.String child,
                                                         java.lang.String path)
Adding a file (or directory) to the file tree manager. This looks to see if the directory has already been opened and updates the filetree if it has.

Parameters:
file - to add to the tree
